it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.view.inet

Class UserConnectionBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.view.inet.UserConnectionBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserConnection
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RMIUserConnection, SocketUserConnection

    public abstract class UserConnectionBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserConnection
    Abstract user connection that implements the publisher-subscriber mechanism.
    See Also:
    for further information.
